name: lazyload.js
description: Image and DOM lazy loading with JS
keywords: lazyload, lazy, load, js, javascript, dom, images, ajax

scripts.build: browserify ./lazyload.js -s lazyload -p deumdify > build/lazyload.js && ccjs build/lazyload.js > build/lazyload.min.js
scripts.dev: npm run watch & DEBUG=zuul* zuul --local 80 -- test/*.js
scripts.test: npm run build && DEBUG=zuul* zuul --tunnel ngrok -- test/*.js
